courseName: Introduction to the Western (Abrahamic) Religions: Judaism, Christianity, and Islam
description: An overview of the three main western monotheistic (Abrahamic) religions, together with the concepts used in studying religion, The focus will be on the origins and representative texts along with some historical development and current experience of each religion.
